ack.p: We thank the Canadian Centre for Climate Modelling and Analysis, Environment Canada, and the Meteorological Service of Canada, Quebec region for providing Canadian Global Climate Model CGCM3.1 data and for allowing us to use their servers for computational purposes. We also thank the Ouranos Consortium (Climate Simulation team) for Canadian Regional Climate Model CRCM4.2.3 data, and the North American Regional Climate Change Assessment Program for WRF (Weather Research and Forecasting Model) and MM5I (Fifth-Generation Penn State/NCAR Mesoscale Model) data.
